headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods receives funding to scale up their precision-fermented, animal-free dairy production.

headline: Modern Meadow Announces Bio-Based Leather Alternative Partnership
summary: Modern Meadow partners to expand production of their bio-based leather alternative.

headline: Solar Foods Factory Begins Production of Solein Protein
summary: Solar Foods begins commercial production of Solein, a protein made from air and electricity.

headline: Algiknit Raises Series A for Seaweed-Based Yarn Production
summary: Algiknit secures funding to scale up production of their biodegradable yarn made from seaweed.

headline: The EVERY Company Launches Animal-Free Egg White Powder
summary: The EVERY Company releases their precision-fermented egg white protein powder for commercial use.

headline: BioMason Receives Grant for Biocement Research
summary: BioMason awarded a grant to further develop their biocement technology for sustainable construction.

headline: Perfect Day Partners with Nestle for Animal-Free Ice Cream
summary: Perfect Day collaborates with Nestle to create and launch a new line of animal-free ice cream products.

headline: Piñatex Expands Production Capacity
summary: Ananas Anam increases production capacity for Piñatex, their pineapple leaf-based leather alternative.

headline: Air Protein Announces Commercial Launch Date
summary: Air Protein sets date for the commercial release of their air-based protein products.

headline: MycoWorks Fine Mycelium™ Production Facility Opens
summary: MycoWorks opens a large-scale production facility for their Fine Mycelium™ material, Reishi™.
